original_text: And it shall come to pass afterward, that I will pour out my spirit upon all flesh; and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, your old men shall dream dreams, your young men shall see visions:
korean_text: 그 후에 내가 내 영을 만민에게 부어 주리니 너희 자녀들이 장래 일을 말할 것이며 너희 늙은이는 꿈을 꾸며 너희 젊은이는 이상을 볼 것이며

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass afterward
that I will pour out my spirit
and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 아들들과 너의 딸들이 예언할 것이며

sentences.original_text: your old men shall dream dreams
your young men shall see visions
